/*********************** TOOL TIP STYLES **********************/ /* The following CSS classes are used by the F# formatter and */ /* so you should include them whenever you want to display */ /* HTML code generated by FSharp.CodeFormat.dll */ /**************************************************************/ /* identifier */ span.i { color: #000000; } /* comment */ span.c { color: #008000; } /* inactive code */ span.inactive { color: #808080; } /* keywords */ span.k { color: #000080; } /* numbers */ span.n { color: #008000; } /* operators */ span.o { color: #800080; } /* preprocessor */ span.prep { color: #800080; } /* string */ span.s { color: #808000; } /* line number */ span.l { color: #80b0b0; } /* fsi output */ span.fsi { font-style: italic; color: #606060; } /* omitted */ span.omitted { border: solid 1px #d8d8d8; color: #808080; padding: 0px 0px 1px 0px; background: #fafafa; } /* tool tip */ div.tip { font: 10pt calibri, sans-serif; padding: 3px; border: 1px solid #606060; background: #ffffd0; display: none; }
